newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: India tenders to buy 25,000/T more Nov fuel oil.
newsitem.headline: India tenders to buy 25,000/T more Nov fuel oil.

text.p: State-owned Indian Oil Corp (IOC) has issued a tender to buy high sulphur fuel oil for delivery in November, industry sources said on Tuesday.
The tender seeks a 25,000-tonne cargo of 3.5-percent suphur grade, 180-centistoke fuel oil for delivery between November 16-20 on a cost-and-freight basis to Bombay/Kandla on the Indian west coast.
The tender will close on October 31 and is valid until November 1.
IOC has already issued a tender to buy 25,000 tonnes of fuel oil for November 6-10 delivery. The tender will close on October 23 and is valid until Ocotber 25.
